title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. II, subch. F - UNIFORM SYSTEMS OF ACCOUNTS
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. II, subch. F - UNIFORM SYSTEMS OF ACCOUNTS
State Regulations

Article 1 - CLASSES A AND B (Part 165 to 172)

Article 2 - Classes C and D (Part 180 to 183)

Article 3 - Municipal Electric Utilities (Part 195 to 197)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. II, subch. F
Each utility, upon filing a waiver of statutory notice with
the commission not later than 60 days after service of a copy of the June 16, 1970 resolution, is authorized and permitted to keep its records and accounts
in conformity with the Uniform Systems of Accounts as amended commencing

January 1, 1970. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
